works.description:
The first copyrighted work at issue  
includes an exclusive question and answer page from WomansDivorce.com. The
 
material consists of user generated posts which have been answered by our
life coach and belongs exclusively to WomansDivorce.com. The remaining  
infringing content includes my introduction to all articles that were  
provided by other authors for use on WomansDivorce.com. One article kept
my  
affiliate link intact. And another infringing page also contains my
linking  
structure at the bottom.  All of these infringing pages either exact
copies  
of my pages.
